scene1.text: You wake up in a forest. What do you do?

scene2.text: You find a path. Do you follow it?

scene3.text: You fall back asleep. You dream of adventures...

scene4.text: You yell for help but no one answers. You feel alone.

scene5.text: You follow the path and see a beautiful waterfall.

scene6.text: You ignore the path and venture off into the forest.

scene7.text: You sit and rest, feeling calm. What will you do next?

scene8.text: You get close to the waterfall and feel the mist on your face.

scene9.text: You walk away from the waterfall, continuing your journey.

scene10.text: You find a beautiful clearing in the forest.

scene11.text: You jump into the water and swim to the other side.

scene12.text: You climb out of the water, feeling refreshed.

scene13.text: You swim further but the water is getting colder.
